statements: SELECT * FROM mergers_and_acquisitions;
SELECT deal_id, deal_name, deal_value FROM mergers_and_acquisitions WHERE deal_value > 1000000;
SELECT acquirer_company, target_company FROM mergers_and_acquisitions WHERE deal_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT deal_name, deal_value FROM mergers_and_acquisitions WHERE acquirer_company = 'Google';
SELECT * FROM mergers_and_acquisitions ORDER BY deal_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT deal_id, deal_name, acquirer_company, deal_value FROM mergers_and_acquisitions WHERE deal_value > 1000000 ORDER BY deal_date DESC;
SELECT deal_name, target_company FROM mergers_and_acquisitions WHERE acquirer_company = 'Google' ORDER BY deal_value ASC;
SELECT deal_id, deal_name, acquirer_company, target_company FROM mergers_and_acquisitions WHERE deal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY target_company DESC;
SELECT deal_id, deal_name, acquirer_company, target_company, deal_value, deal_date FROM mergers_and_acquisitions WHERE acquirer_company LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY deal_value DESC, deal_date ASC;
SELECT acquirer_company, target_company, deal_value FROM mergers_and_acquisitions WHERE target_company IN ('Apple', 'Microsoft', 'Amazon') ORDER BY acquirer_company ASC, deal_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM MergersAndAcquisitions;
SELECT deal_name, client_name, transaction_amount FROM MergersAndAcquisitions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT deal_name, client_name, transaction_amount FROM MergersAndAcquisitions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000000;
SELECT deal_id, deal_name, client_name, transaction_amount FROM MergersAndAcquisitions JOIN DealProgress ON MergersAndAcquisitions.deal_id = DealProgress.deal_id;

SELECT deal_name, progress_stage, update_date FROM MergersAndAcquisitions JOIN DealProgress ON MergersAndAcquisitions.deal_id = DealProgress.deal_id WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT deal_name, client_name FROM MergersAndAcquisitions;
SELECT * FROM MergersAndAcquisitions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000000;
SELECT deal_name, client_name, transaction_amount FROM MergersAndAcquisitions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT deal_name, client_name, progress_stage, update_date FROM MergersAndAcquisitions JOIN DealProgress ON MergersAndAcquisitions.deal_id = DealProgress.deal_id;
SELECT DISTINCT client_name FROM MergersAndAcquisitions;
SELECT * FROM mergers;
SELECT id, deal_name, deal_status FROM mergers WHERE deal_status = 'Completed';
SELECT deal_name, deal_value FROM mergers ORDER BY deal_value DESC;
SELECT acq.target_company, acq.deal_value, dp.progress_status FROM acquisitions acq INNER JOIN deal_progress dp ON acq.id = dp.deal_id;
SELECT acq.target_company, acq.announcement_date FROM acquisitions acq WHERE acq.deal_value > 1000000;
SELECT deal_name, deal_status FROM mergers ORDER BY deal_value DESC;
SELECT acquiring_company, deal_value FROM acquisitions WHERE announcement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT deal_name, close_date FROM mergers WHERE deal_status = 'Completed' AND close_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT target_company, acquiring_company, deal_value FROM acquisitions WHERE deal_value > 1000000 ORDER BY deal_value ASC, announcement_date DESC;
SELECT m.deal_name, a.target_company, dp.progress_status FROM mergers m JOIN acquisitions a ON m.id = a.id JOIN deal_progress dp ON m.id = dp.deal_id WHERE dp.update_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT * FROM mergers_acquisitions;
SELECT deal_id, company_name, deal_value FROM mergers_acquisitions WHERE deal_status='completed';
SELECT bank_name, headquarters_location FROM investment_banks ORDER BY bank_name DESC;
SELECT advisor_name, bank_name, advisor_id FROM deal_advisors WHERE advisor_id = 1;
SELECT deal_id, progress_description, progress_date FROM deal_progress WHERE progress_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM mergers_acquisitions WHERE deal_status='Completed';
SELECT company_name, deal_value FROM mergers_acquisitions WHERE deal_value > 1000000 ORDER BY deal_value DESC;

SELECT advisor_name, bank_name, company_name FROM deal_advisors JOIN investment_banks ON deal_advisors.bank_id = investment_banks.bank_id JOIN mergers_acquisitions ON deal_advisors.deal_id = mergers_acquisitions.deal_id WHERE bank_name='Goldman Sachs';

SELECT advisor_name, progress_description, progress_date FROM deal_advisors JOIN deal_progress ON deal_advisors.deal_id = deal_progress.deal_id WHERE advisor_name='John Smith' ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, deal_value, deal_status FROM mergers_acquisitions WHERE deal_status='Ongoing' AND deal_value > 500000 ORDER BY deal_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentBank;
SELECT id, name, location FROM InvestmentBank ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT company_name, advisor FROM MergersAndAcquisitions WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT portfolio_name, investment_amount FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE investment_type = 'Equity' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT participant_name, role, contact_email FROM DealParticipants WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentBank WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, name, description FROM InvestmentBank WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, company_name, advisor, status FROM MergersAndAcquisitions WHERE status = 'completed' AND advisor IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM DealProgress WHERE progress_percentage >= 75 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, role, participant_name FROM DealParticipants WHERE role LIKE '%manager%' OR role LIKE '%director%' ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
